part_description: Three drawers vertically stacked, each with a handle and dark front panel, evenly spaced.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet frame, guided by internal tracks. The handles provide leverage for opening and closing, ensuring stability and alignment. The dark panels may indicate compartments or viewing windows, enhancing functionality and design coherence.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet interacts with users who pull the handles to access contents. It can be placed against walls or integrated into kitchen or office settings, providing organized storage. Its metallic finish may reflect ambient light, contributing to the room's aesthetic.
